duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle various types of incoming inquiries from clients regarding insurance products and financial markets.
Deliver exceptional customer service and adhere to departmental goals and guidelines.
Participate in and complete customer service training to remain current with operational policies, new products, and procedures.
Answer an average of 45-55 inbound calls per day and navigate multiple administrative systems to perform basic calculations and respond to customer inquiries.
Manage a heavy call volume and be reliable in meeting attendance and punctuality standards.
